about.title: About Pascal Info
about.description: Founded in 1996, Pascal Info has become a center of excellence in professional training in Morocco. Our comprehensive approach combines technical expertise and personal development to prepare our students for the challenges of the modern job market.

Exceptional success rate among our graduates

items.title: 2-Year Diploma in Software Development
items.description: Comprehensive training in programming and software development.
items.targetAudience: Science/technical high school graduates, computer enthusiasts, professionals seeking career change.
prerequisites: Good level of logic and mathematics.
learningObjectives: Work in teams and manage projects.
curriculumHighlights: Frontend Web Development (HTML, CSS, JS, React/Angular)
items.teachingMethods: Interactive theoretical courses, intensive practical work, individual and group projects, case studies, internship in a company.
items.assessmentMethods: Continuous assessment, semester exams, projects, internship/final project defense.
items.furtherStudies: Professional Bachelor's Degree (L3), Engineering Schools (parallel admissions).
items.certification: Specialized Technician Diploma in Computer Development, accredited by the State.

items.title: 2-Year Diploma in Business Management
items.description: Acquire essential skills to manage and develop a business.
items.targetAudience: High school graduates from all streams, employees wishing to advance to management positions.
learningObjectives: Manage administrative and human resource aspects.
items.teachingMethods: Courses, case studies, business simulations, group work, practical internship.
items.assessmentMethods: Continuous assessment, written and oral exams, final project, internship evaluation.
items.furtherStudies: Bachelor's in Management, Economics, Business Schools (parallel admissions).
items.certification: Specialized Technician Diploma in Business Management, accredited by the State.

items.title: Academic Support Courses
items.description: Personalized support for students of all levels.
items.targetAudience: Primary school, middle school, high school, and university students.
items.teachingMethods: Individual or small group tutoring, course review, homework help, exam preparation, learning methodology.
items.duration: One-time sessions or regular follow-up throughout the academic year.
items.levels: Primary, Middle School, High School, Higher Education (depending on subjects).

items.title: Language Courses
items.description: Learn foreign languages with modern and effective methods.
items.targetAudience: Students, professionals, individuals wishing to learn or improve a language.
languagesOffered: French (FFL - French as a Foreign Language)
items.levels: All levels (A1 to C2 according to CEFR), adapted courses (beginner, intermediate, advanced).
items.teachingMethods: Communicative approach, immersion, role plays, multimedia resources, small groups to encourage interaction.
items.certification: Preparation for international certifications (DELF/DALF, TCF, TOEFL, IELTS, DELE, Goethe-Zertifikat).

items.title: Professional Continuing Education
items.description: Improve your skills or redirect your career.
items.targetAudience: Employees, job seekers, companies wishing to train their staff.
areasOffered: IT & Office Tools (Advanced Excel, MS Project, etc.)
learningObjectives: Acquire new technical or managerial skills.
items.teachingMethods: Short and targeted training, practical workshops, seminars, possibility of customized training for companies (in-house/external).
items.duration: Varies by module (several days to several weeks).

items.title: Translation Services
items.description: Professional translation services in multiple languages.

items.title: Higher Education Enrollment Support
items.description: Assistance for enrollments in Morocco and abroad.
items.targetAudience: High school students and graduates wishing to pursue higher education.
servicesOffered: Preparation of application files (Morocco, France, Canada, USA, etc.)

items.title: VIP and Fully-Equipped Rooms
items.description: Modern spaces with video projectors for an optimal learning experience.
features: Reception and coffee break area (upon request)
items.capacity: Rooms accommodating from 10 to 50 people (depending on the room).
